questions.question: What is Nemesis the goddess of in Greek mythology?
Which of the following traits is Nemesis most associated with?
Who was Nemesis' mother according to some versions of Greek mythology?
Nemesis is said to punish those who display which of the following qualities?
Which god is Nemesis often portrayed in opposition to due to his association with excess and indulgence?
Who did Nemesis give birth to after Zeus pursued her in the form of a swan?
What is the role of Nemesis in the myth of Narcissus?
options: A) She rewards Narcissus for his devotion
B) She punishes Narcissus for his vanity
C) She falls in love with Narcissus
D) She helps Narcissus find his true love

questions.question: What was Nemesis' relationship to the concept of fate in Greek mythology?
options: B) She punishes those who defy fate
C) She works alongside the Fates
